description: Unique system-generated identifier for a tax line record, used as the primary key and for referential links.
Business code identifying the specific tax reporting line item to which amounts are mapped (e.g., Schedule C line); used for tax form mapping.
Readable description of the tax line itemâ€™s purpose or tax form context, displayed in UIs and reports to clarify the code.
Flag indicating the tax line is deprecated/inactive and should not be used for new mappings; retained only for historical reference.
